description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Who says paper always wins? When was the last time you stopped a flying rock with a piece of paper?! It's time you witnessed the true power, of the almighty ROCK!! Now equipped with lazers, rockets and other assorted weaponry. Not to mention the teleportation do-hickey's.....So now it's time to fight for your survival in the ultimate game of Rock, Paper, Lazers!!
description.short: Who says paper always wins? When was the last time you stopped a flying rock with a piece of paper?! It's time you witnessed the true power, of the almighty ROCK!!
